mapper.select: select f.id, m.name, f.subject, f.content, f.readcount, f.date from freeboard f join member m on f.member_id=m.id order by id desc limit #{startRow},#{pageSize}
select f.id, m.name, f.subject, f.content, f.readcount, f.date from freeboard f join member m on f.member_id=m.id where f.id=#{id}
mapper.update: update freeboard set readcount=readcount+1 where id=#{id}
update freeboard set subject=#{subject}, content=#{content} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select f.id, m.name, f.freeboard_id, f.content, f.date from freeboard_comment f join member m where f.freeboard_id=#{content_id}
select f.id, m.name, f.subject, f.content, f.readcount, f.date from freeboard f join member m on f.member_id=m.id where f.subject like #{search} order by id desc limit #{startRow},#{pageSize}
